title: Venetian-Style Potatoes
introduction: Venetian-Style Potatoes, or Patate alla Veneziana, offer a delightful and simple way to prepare potatoes with a touch of Italian flair. Using Yukon gold potatoes for their creamy texture, this dish combines the earthy essence of potatoes with the sweetness of onions and the freshness of parsley. Perfect for a hearty side dish, these potatoes are sure to complement any meal.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds all-purpose potatoes, such as Yukon gold
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Scrub the potatoes with a brush under cold running water. Peel them if desired. Cut the potatoes into halves or quarters if large.
In a large skillet, melt the butter with the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the potatoes and salt and pepper to taste. Cover the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
Add the parsley and stir well. Serve hot.
